thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Ex-White House Aide Rick Dearborn Joins Washington Consulting Firm

author: Michael C. Bender
title: Ex-White House Aide Rick Dearborn Joins Washington Consulting Firm
text:
WASHINGTON—Former White House Deputy Chief of Staff Rick Dearborn has been named partner at the Cypress Group, a Washington-based consulting firm that specializes in the legislative and regulatory effect on businesses.
As one of President Donald Trump’s top aides, Mr. Dearborn oversaw the White House’s political operation, public outreach and legislative-affairs teams. He announced his resignation in December and remained on staff until last month.
...
